Enjoy easy flights to Kota Kinabalu from Manila twice a week every  Mondays and Fridays starting October 31, 2022.

Travels back from Kota Kinabalu to Manila are flying twice a week, every Tuesdays and Saturdays starting November 1, 2022. Book now at https://t.co/taKDgpUG24. https://t.co/VgBHcDCflR
@jashfranco Hi Jan Ashlee! You may save an online copy. Travel requirements, contactless quidelines and Frequently Asked Questions may also be found here: https://t.co/lBwTdCJvJb See you soon!

data.text: @NikiOfTheClouds Are you planning to bring your pet inside the cabin? If so, note that we do allow service dog inside the cabin. For more details regarding service animal/dog, kindly refer to this link: https://t.co/pyM3DKjcXi. Otherwise, you may reach out to our Cargo team for other details.

@iamrandolph Hi Ed! Thanks for the info. For further checking on your concern, please email us thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.
@goplaceswphdiza We are sorry to hear this, Phidiza. Kindly consider in re-installing the app then try again. You may also book a flight thru our website. Thank you
@abi_gls HI abi! Yes, these may be included in your hand carry.  Just be reminded that hand carry may only weigh a maximum of 7kgs and have a dimension of up to 56cm x 36cm x 23cm only. Thank you

@artsyeology Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, @artsyeology. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@_slickrick Hi @_slickrick! Effective September 20, 2022, Cebu Pacific will now operate its departure and arrival at Singapore Changi Airport Terminal 4. Thank you

@SummerAwkward Hi @SummerAwkward! Kindly note that PWD discount are for domestic flight only. This is applicable to base fare of a regular fares only. Promo fares and/or any fare lower than the 20% discount is not eligible. Thank you

@peyky Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, Carmi. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@alterbu We are sorry to hear your frustrations, hash. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@whoislikemikey Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, Michael. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@Miaka29126680 Hi Miaka! You can bring bottles of perfume in your checked baggage. Note that you can only bring a maximum of two (2) liters of liquids in your checked baggage. Note that it must have a protective cap to prevent the inadvertent release of its contents. Thank you!

@gladagojo Hi Glad A.! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@waLEIforever We are sorry for the inconvenience, @waLEIforever. Kindly consider in re-installing the app then try again. You may also refer to our website to book a flight. Thank you

@aa1ex_ We are sorry to hear your frustrations, @aa1ex. To check on your concern and to assist you as well, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@glvdz023 We are sorry to hear your frustrations, @glvdz023. You may also send your concern thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc) for further assistance. Thank you

data.text: @EXOxoxo_L0VE Hi EXO! Tripods are not allowed in your hand carry for safety reasons. See you on board soon!

@song_emilia Hi Emilia_Song! The requirements differ depending on which stage of gestation the mother is in. If below 34 weeks. No need to prepare anything special. You can proceed with your flight as usual. Stay safe!

@msabillo1 Hi msabillo! May we verify what kind of meat products? You may bring your own food in your checked baggage as long as it fits within the given allowance. Just be sure that food is securely packed and sealed in a container so it won’t leak or cause unpleasant odors.

data.text: @agentmarygrace We will be glad to look into it, https://t.co/whQx0tbkSU further assist you and security of your information, please send us a  message  via Charlie the chatbot  thru https://t.co/zvAz6wEvz3. Or, send us a private message through https://t.co/gNaqWVnZKE . Thanks!
@itsmarianfong You're most welcome Marian! Please take care!
@itsmarianfong Got this Marian. We forwarded this to relevant team. Please monitor your email.
@itsmarianfong Hi Marian. May we have your case number with the same documents that was approved before?
@NasserAlonto Hi Nasser. Yes, it's 5J 814 from Singapore to Manila this September 28, 2022. Stay safe.

@PassJustPass1 Hi Blank ¯\_(ツ)_/¯. Valid ID includes Company or School ID, passport, or government-issued ID cards which reflects on its face the name, picture, date of birth, and nationality of the guest checking-in (e.g. SSS, GSIS, Driver’s License, UMID, PRC ID, PWD ID or OSCA)

@itsmarianfong Apologies Marian. If Medical Case, affected guest may submit Medical Certificate with Doctor's PRC license; or Medical Certification written on Doctor's Prescription Pad with License Number of Doctor indicated. Subject for approval.

data.text: @itsmarianfong Got this Marian. It shows here that agent tried to escalate your document to relevant team. However, it should be a medical certificate in doctor's RX pad and until when passenger is unfit to travel. Kindly send revised one to your case owner. Stay safe.
@itsmarianfong Hi Marian! Can we have your case number or chat session number so I could do a follow-up to the agent?

@itsmarianfong Hi Marian. We are sorry if you are having a hard time. If ever, you may submit instead a Medical Certification written on Doctor's Prescription Pad with License Number of Doctor indicated. Documents are subject for approval. You may send your response to your original case owner.

data.text: @iamrandolph I'm sorry to hear this Ed. We will help you look into it. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.
@JhaoVelasco Hi Jhao.  Our agents are currently working on other requests at the moment. Rest assured that agents will be in touch with you as soon as we can thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK.

@johnsantos02 We regret that you feel that way JE. You may kindly accomplish our Guest Feedback Form thru this link https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc and we will respond to you through the email you provided. Stay safe.

@moonlitbabe Hi judibiiiii 🌙✨. We accept liquid in checked baggage, as long as it's in leak-proof packaging. Checked baggage cannot be loosely packed because these may explode or spill over your baggage or other passengers' baggage. Stay safe.

@leighdenilla I'm sorry to hear this 🐨. At any time after a booking has been made, we may change our schedules and/or cancel or delay any flight where we reasonably consider this to be justified by circumstances beyond our control or for reasons of safety and security.

Our A321neo aircraft will run on blended Sustainable Aviation Fuel! Come and experience a NEO way to fly on Flight 5J 814 from Singapore to Manila this September 28, 2022.

Book now at https://t.co/taKDgpUG24. https://t.co/8yz2t14cfY

Don’t miss this chance to be a part of history! Book a trip this Sept 28, 2022 and be a part of our first sustainable flight, 5J 814 from SIN-MNL! Our A321neo emits less carbon vs. other aircraft, powered by blended Sustainable Aviation Fuel. Book now at https://t.co/taKDgpUG24. https://t.co/qmuIbIepCi

@lollipopsiklz You're most welcome olaola! Please take care!

@raphaelortuoste Hi Tango. Fuel surcharge is an added cost to the fare to cover the unprecedented rises and/or fluctuating prices in aviation fuel. CEB applies fuel surcharge on its domestic and international passenger tickets. Stay safe.

@lollipopsiklz Apologies olaola. However, for voluntary rebooking or changes in the itinerary and when the booking details have been changed, the Passenger can no longer revert to the original itinerary. Stay safe.

@lollipopsiklz Hi olaola! How can we help you?

@xwhereinsnoonax Hi 6rowing. Regret but, Philhealth ID (PVC type) will be accepted as Valid identification for domestic flight , however you may present other government IDs.  Remember, all  documents/ IDs presented are subject to airports discretion and profiling.   Thanks!
@kiyanuuuh Got this K 🎀💗. I'll let your case handler know that you reached out. Please expect an email from him soon.

@busrayilld Hi Busra. We apologize for the confusion. As per checking, there's a time adjustment of 10minutes only. New departure time will be 5J14/01OCT MNLDXB STD 1930H STA 0040H+1. We'll resend your itinerary. You may also view thru Manage booking. Stay safe!

@kiyanuuuh Got this K 🎀💗. It shows here that you were able to request one booking reference with two passengers for travel fund which was approved upon escalation of documents submitted under chat session number 7034701. Stay safe.
@kiyanuuuh I'm sorry to hear this K 🎀💗. Can we have your chat session number or case number so we could check? Thank you in advance.
@xwhereinsnoonax Hi 6rowingWith7DREAM 💗! How can we help you?

data.text: @resistance_luv I'm sorry to hear this Unknown. Please do the following troubleshooting & then try again. -Clear your browser's cache & cookies -Use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) -Try to use Google Chrome browser if possible. Stay safe.

@dasurvkoto Hi dump 🚁. In your hand-carry bag, you may bring liquids that are less than 100ml per each bottle/container. You may bring your own food in hand-carry as long as it fits within the given allowance- (1) hand carry w/ a maximum weight of 7 kgs dimension of up to 56cm x 36cm x 23cm
